Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Response
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead which has methods to add headers and cookies.
    play.db.jpa.JPAEntityManagerContext
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
    play.Logger
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use slf4j directly. For more details see https://github.com/playframework/playframework/issues/1669
    play.db.jpa.TransactionalAction
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
    play.data.validation.ValidatorProvider
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorFactoryProvider instead.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    play.db.jpa.Transactional
    Use a dependency injected JPAApi instance here, since 2.7.0
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context._requestHeader()
    Use Http.Context.request().asScala() instead. Since 2.7.0.
    play.mvc.Http.WrappedContext._requestHeader()
    Use Http.WrappedContext.request().asScala() instead. Since 2.7.0.
    play.data.Form.allErrors()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.errors().
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asByteArray()
    Use response.getBodyAsBytes().toArray()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asJson()
    Use response.getBody(json())
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.asXml()
    Use response.getBody(xml())
    play.mvc.Controller.changeLang(Lang)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang) or Result.withLang(Lang, MessagesApi).
    play.mvc.Http.Context.changeLang(Lang)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang).
    play.mvc.Controller.changeLang(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang) or Result.withLang(Lang, MessagesApi).
    play.mvc.Http.Context.changeLang(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.setLang(Result, Lang).
    play.mvc.Controller.clearLang()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.clearLang(Result) or Result.clearingLang(MessagesApi).
    play.mvc.Http.Context.clearLang()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use MessagesApi.clearLang(Result).
    play.mvc.Result.cookie(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result.getCookie(String)
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.em()
    The EntityManager is supplied as lambda parameter instead when using DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(Function)
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.em()
    The EntityManager is supplied as lambda parameter instead when using JPAApi.withTransaction(Function)
    play.mvc.Http.Context.fileMimeTypes()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Inject a FileMimeTypes and use the FileMimeTypes.fileMimeTypes method instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.flash()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.flash() and Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.flash()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.flash() and Result instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.flash(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.flash(String, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Cookies.get(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Http.Cookies.getCookie(String)
    play.cache.AsyncCacheApi.get(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use AsyncCacheApi.getOptional(String) instead.
    play.cache.DefaultAsyncCacheApi.get(String)
    play.cache.DefaultSyncCacheApi.get(String)
    play.cache.SyncCacheApi.get(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use SyncCacheApi.getOptional(String) instead.
    play.cache.SyncCacheApiAdapter.get(String)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    Deprecated since 2.6.0. Use AhcWSResponse.getHeaders() instead.
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getAllHeaders()
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    Use response.getBody(inputStream())
    play.libs.ws.WSResponse.getBodyAsStream()
    use getBody(BodyReadable) with WSBodyWritables.inputStream().
    play.data.DynamicForm.getError(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to DynamicForm.error(String).
    play.data.Form.getError(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.error(String).
    play.data.Form.getGlobalError()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.globalError().
    play.data.Form.Field.getName()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.Field.name().
    play.data.Form.Field.getValue()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Method has been renamed to Form.Field.value().
    play.Application.getWrappedApplication()
    Use Application.asScala() instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.id()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0 Use Http.RequestHeader.id() instead.
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.patch(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.post(InputStream)
    use WSRequest.post(BodyWritable)
    play.mvc.Controller.response()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.response()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.Implicit.response()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.WrappedContext.response()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.session()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.session() and Result instead.
    play.mvc.Http.Context.session()
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Http.RequestHeader.session() and Result instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.session(String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.mvc.Controller.session(String, String)
    Deprecated as of 2.7.0. Use Result instead.
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setBody(InputStream)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setBody(InputStream)
    use WSRequest.setBody(BodyWritable)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setHeader(String, String)
    use addHeader(name, value)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setHeader(String, String)
    use WSRequest.addHeader(String, String)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setQueryParameter(String, String)
    Use addQueryParameter
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setQueryParameter(String, String)
    use WSRequest.addQueryParameter(String, String)
    play.libs.ws.ahc.AhcWSRequest.setRequestTimeout(long)
    Use AhcWSRequest.setRequestTimeout(Duration timeout)
    play.libs.ws.WSRequest.setRequestTimeout(long)
    use WSRequest.setRequestTimeout(Duration)
    play.db.Database.toScala()
    As of release 2.6.0. Use Database.asScala()
    play.libs.typedmap.TypedKey.underlying()
    As of release 2.6.8. Use TypedKey.asScala()
    play.libs.typedmap.TypedMap.underlying()
    As of release 2.6.8. Use TypedMap.asScala()
    play.core.cookie.encoding.DefaultCookie.validateValue(String, String)
    CookieUtil is package private, will be removed once old Cookie API is dropped
    play.data.validation.ValidatorsComponents.validator()
    Deprecated since 2.7.0. Use ValidatorsComponents.validatorFactory() instead.
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(Runnable)
    Use DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(Consumer)
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.withTransaction(Runnable)
    Use JPAApi.withTransaction(Consumer)
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(String, boolean, Supplier<T>)
    Use DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(String, boolean, Function)
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.withTransaction(String, boolean, Supplier<T>)
    Use JPAApi.withTransaction(String, boolean, Function)
    play.db.jpa.DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(Supplier<T>)
    Use DefaultJPAApi.withTransaction(Function)
    play.db.jpa.JPAApi.withTransaction(Supplier<T>)
    Use JPAApi.withTransaction(Function)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    play.mvc.Http.Context(Long, RequestHeader, Http.Request, Http.Response, Http.Session, Http.Flash, Map<String, Object>, JavaContextComponents)
    Use #Context(Long, play.api.mvc.RequestHeader, Request, Response, Session, Flash, Map, Lang, JavaContextComponents) instead. Since 2.7.0.
    play.DefaultApplication(Application, Config, Injector)
    Use DefaultApplication.DefaultApplication(play.api.Application, Config, Injector, Environment) instead.
    play.mvc.Http.RequestImpl(RequestHeader)
    Since 2.7.0. Use #RequestImpl(play.api.mvc.Request) instead.
